title: Houseguests
alt: You can come on in, we're all fully vaccinated. Except the spare room off the living room. Don't go in there, we're not fully vaccinated in there.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are talking.]
Cueball: Now that we're fully vaccinated, we can invite people over.
Megan: Exciting![Same setting, without talk. Beat panel.][Cueball and Megan are standing in a wider panel. Megan is looking down at her torso while holding her arms out from her body.]
Cueball: Which means we have to clean.
Megan: ...You know, I suddenly feel only about 98% vaccinated.
Cueball: Yeah, let's give it a few more days.
